entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
